snippet: The aluminum producer said Monday that it lost $191 million in the fourth quarter, its first loss in more than a year.
abstract: Alcoa reports loss of $191 million in the fourth quarter, its first loss in more than a year, on fewer orders for its products.
lead_paragraph: The aluminum producer said Monday that it lost $191 million in the fourth quarter, its first loss in more than a year.

headline.main: Alcoa Posts Loss on Fewer Orders and Lower Prices
headline.print_headline: Alcoa Posts Loss on Fewer Orders and Lower Prices
